resources.string: Iva Ilcheva - Reinard Lazuardi Kuwandy - Weimeng Pu

Team Ironix was established for Mobile and Wearable Computer course in Fall semester 2019 at Università della Svizzera italiana. Our team consists of 3 students from Master in Artificial Intelligence major. They are Iva Ilcheva, Reinard Lazuardi Kuwandy, and Weimeng Pu. Our target in this course is not only to learn how to developed a good mobile and wearable application but also how to implement it into a real application project which are going to be created during the courses. We believe that we can get knowledge and insight that can be used for the future in the real world. 

 For more information of Ironix Team, see the Ironix Repository at https://github.com/Ironix-USI. 

 Now, we are going to introduce ourselves. Who are we, our background and interest and the reason why we take the Mobile and Wearable Computing course. 

 Profile: 

 1. Iva Ilcheva - "Ciao, my name is Iva Ilcheva. I am a 2nd-year Master student in Artificial Intelligence at USI. I have a BSc in Information Systems and background in Full-Stack Development with JS/Node.js. I am proficient in Web UI and I've always wanted to gain hands-down knowledge in Android/iOS UI by completing a course on the topic in order to be able to operate on any platform. I believe Mobile Computing and Wearable Devices will aid just that!" 

 2. Reinard Lazuardi Kuwandy — Hi, my name is Reinard Lazuardi Kuwandy. Currently I'm studying Master in Artificial Intelligence at Università della Svizzera italiana. My background is computer science and I believe mobile and wearable is part of it, that's on of the reasons why I took this course. Beside of it, Mobile and wearable technology has grown very fast. This means we can't ignore it, we need to know and understand how the development of mobile and wearable devices. Further more, my target in this course is to be able implement the theory that I will learn into a real applications mobile project.

 ”If you can dream it, you can do it”- Walt Disney - 

 3. Weimeng Pu — My name is Weimeng Pu. I am in the same major as my two teammates above, and also a computer background from bachelor. My reason to take this course is to see how android works since algorithm and software development live together.
